GV05agsas_1u:4: śāntipāṭha oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemākṣabhiryajatrāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:7: svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:8: svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu //
GV05agsas_1u:10: āgama prakaraṇa INVOCATION prajñānāṃśupratānaiḥ sthiracaranikaravyāpibhir vyāpya lokān bhuktvā bhogānsthaviṣṭhānpunarapi dhiṣaṇodbhāsitānkāmajanyān /
GV05agsas_1u:11: pītvā sarvān viśeṣān svapiti madhurabhuṅ māyayā bhojayanno māyāsaṃkhyāturīyaṃ paramamṛtamajaṃ brahma yattannato 'smi //1//
GV05agsas_1u:12: yo viśvātmā vidhijaviṣayān prāśya bhogān sthaviṣṭhān paścāc cānyān svamativibhavāñ jyotiṣā svena sūkṣmān /
GV05agsas_1u:13: sarvān etān punar api śanaiḥ svātmani sthāpayitvā hitvā sarvānviśeṣānvigataguṇagaṇaḥ pātvasau nasturīyaḥ //2//
GV05agsas_1u:18: yānyeva tu vedānte sambandhābhidheya prayojanāni tānyeveha bhavitumarhanti /
GV05agsas_1u:20: tatra prayojanavat sādhanābhivyañjakatvenābhidheyasambaddhaṃ śāstraṃ pāramparyeṇa viśiṣṭasaṃbandhābhidheyaprayojanavad bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:21: kiṃ punas tat prayojanam ity ucyate rogārtasyaiva roganivṛttau svasthatā /
GV05agsas_1u:24: dvaitaprapañcasyāvidyākṛtatvād vidyayā tad upaśamaḥ syād iti brahmavidyāprakāśanāyāsya ārambhaḥ kriyate /
GV05agsas_1u:26: 14) “yatra vānyad iva syāt tatrānyo 'nyat paśyed anyo 'nyad vijānīyāt”(bṛ.u 4 /
GV05agsas_1u:28: vāsya sarvam ātmaivābhūt tat kena kaṃ paśyet kena kaṃ vijānīyāt”(bṛ.u 2 /
GV05agsas_1u:30: tatra tāvad oṃkāranirṇayāya prathamaṃ prakaraṇam āgamapradhānām ātmatattvapratipatty upāyabhūtam
GV05agsas_1u:31: yasya dvaitaprapañcasyopaśame 'dvaitapratipattī rajjvām iva sarpādivikalpa upaśame rajjutattvapratipattis tasya dvaitasya hetuto
GV05agsas_1u:33: tathādvaitasyāpi vaitathyaprasaṅgaprāptau yuktitas tathātvadarśanāya tṛtīyaṃ prakaraṇam /
GV05agsas_1u:34: advaitasya tathātvapratipattipakṣabhūtāni yāni vādāntarāṇyavaidikāni teṣām anyonyavirodhitvādatathārthatvena tadupapattibhir eva nirākaraṇāya caturthaṃ prakaraṇam /
GV05agsas_1u:35: kathaṃ puna oṃkāranirṇaya ātmatattvapratipatty upāyatvaṃ pratipadyata ity ucyate”oṃ ity etat”(ka.u 15) “etad ālambanam”(ka.u.1 /
GV05agsas_1u:41: rajjur ādir iva sarpādivikalpasyāspado 'dvaya ātmā paramārthaḥ sanprāṇādivikalpasyāspado yathā tathā sarvo 'pi vākprapañcaḥ prāṇādy ātmavikalpaviṣaya oṃkāra eva /
GV05agsas_1u:43: oṃkāravikāraśabdābhidheyaś ca sarvaḥ prāṇādir ātmavikalpo 'bhidhānavyatirekeṇa nāsti /
GV05agsas_1u:45: 4) “tad asyedaṃ vācā tantyā nāmabhir dāmabhiḥ sarvaṃ sitam” “sarvaṃ hīdaṃ nāmāni”ity ādi śrutibhyaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:46: ata āha oṃ ity etad akṣaram idaṃ sarvaṃ tasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavad bhaviṣyad iti sarvam oṃkāra eva |
GV05agsas_1u:47: yac cānyat trikālātītaṃ tad apy oṃkāra eva || MandUp_1 ||
GV05agsas_1u:49: oṃ ity etad akṣaram idaṃ sarvam iti /
GV05agsas_1u:50: yad idam arthajātam abhidheyabhūtaṃ tasyābhidhānāvyatirekād abhidhānasya ca oṃkārāvyatirekād oṃkāra evedaṃ sarvam /
GV05agsas_1u:51: paraṃ ca brahmābhidhānābhidheya upāyapūrvakam eva gamyata ity oṃkāra eva /
GV05agsas_1u:52: tasyaitasya parāpara brahmarūpasyākṣarasya oṃ ity etasyopavyākhyānam;
GV05agsas_1u:53: brahmapratipatty upāyatvād brahmasamīpatayā vispaṣṭaṃ prakathanam upavyākhyānaṃ prastutaṃ veditavyam iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:54: bhūtaṃ bhavadbhaviṣyad iti kālatrayaparicchedyaṃ yat tad apy oṃkāra evoktanyāyataḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:55: yac cānyat trikālātītaṃ kāryādhigamyaṃ kālāparicchedyamavyākṛtādi tad apy oṃkāra eva //1//
GV05agsas_1u:58: oṃ ity etad akṣaram idaṃ sarvam ity ādy abhidhānaprādhānyena nirdiṣṭasya puno 'bhidheyaprādhānyena nirdeśo 'bhidhānābhidheyayor
GV05agsas_1u:62: ekatvapratipatteś ca prayojanam abhidhānābhidheyayor ekenaiva prayatnena yugapatpravilāparyastadvilakṣaṇaṃ brahma pratipadyeta iti /
GV05agsas_1u:63: tathā ca vakṣyati”pādā mātrā mātrāś ca pādāḥ” (mā.u.8) iti /
GV05agsas_1u:64: tadāha sarvaṃ hy etad brahmāyam ātmā brahma so 'yam ātmā catuṣpāt ||
GV05agsas_1u:68: sarvaṃ yad uktam oṃkāramātram iti tadetad brahma /
GV05agsas_1u:69: tac ca brahma parokṣābhihitaṃ pratyakṣato viśeṣeṇa nirdiśatyayamātmā brahmeti /
GV05agsas_1u:70: ayam iti catuṣpātvena pravibhajyamānaṃ pratyagātmatayābhinayena nirdiśati ayam ātmeti /
GV05agsas_1u:73: trayāṇāṃ viśvādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvapravilāpanena turīyasya pratapattir iti karaṇasādhanaḥ pādaśabdaḥ
GV05agsas_1u:76: kathaṃ catuṣpātvam ity āha jāgaritasthāno bahiḥprajñaḥ saptāṅga ekonaviṃśatimukhaḥ sthūlabhug vaiśvānaraḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ || MandUp_3 ||
GV05agsas_1u:79: bahiṣprajñaḥ svātmavyatirikte viṣaye prajñā sa bahiṣprajño bahir viṣaya eva prajñāvidyākṛtāv avabhāsata ity arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:80: tathā saptāṅgānyasya”tasya ha vaitasyātmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejāś cakṣurviśvarūpaḥ prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmātmā saṃdoho bahulo vastir eva
GV05agsas_1u:82: 2) ity agnihotrakalpanāśeṣatvenāhavanīyo 'gnir asya mukhatvenokta ity evaṃ saptāṅgāni yasya sa saptāṅgaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:83_0: tathaikonaviṃśatir mukhāny asya buddhīndriyāṇi karmendriyāṇi ca daśa vāyavaś ca prāṇādayaḥpañca mano buddhirahaṅkāraccittam
GV05agsas_1u:83_1: iti mukhānīva mukhāni tāny upalabdhidvārāṇityarthaḥ sa evaṃ viśiṣṭo vaiśvānaro yathoktair dvāraiḥ śabdādīn sthūlān viṣayān
GV05agsas_1u:85: yad vā viśvaś cāsau naraś ceti viśvānaraḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:89: katham ayamātmā brahmeti pratyagātmano 'sya catuṣpāttve prakṛte dyulokādīnāṃ mūrdhādyaṅgatvam iti /
GV05agsas_1u:93: sarvabhūtasthaś cātmaiko dṛṣṭaḥ syāt sarvabhūtāni cātmani /
GV05agsas_1u:94: “yas tu sarvāṇi bhūtāni”(ī.u.6) ity ādiśrutyarthopasaṃhṛtaś caivaṃ
GV05agsas_1u:96: anyathā hi svadehaparicchinna eva pratyāgātmā sāṃkhyādibhir iva dṛṣṭaḥ syāt tathā ca satyadvaitam iti śrutikṛto viśeṣo na syāt sāṃkhyādidarśanenāviśeṣāt /
GV05agsas_1u:98: ato yuktam evāsyādhyātmikasya piṇḍātmano dyulokādy aṅgatvena virāḍātmanādhidaivikenaikatvam abhipretya saptāṅgatvavacanam /
GV05agsas_1u:102: uktaṃ caitan madhubrāhmaṇe”yaś cāyam asyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ tejomayo
GV05agsas_1u:105: suṣuptāvyākṛtayaḥ sa tv ekatvaṃ siddham eva nirviśeṣatvāt /
GV05agsas_1u:106: evaṃ ca satyetat siddhaṃ bhaviṣyati sarvadvaita upaśame cādvaitam iti
GV05agsas_1u:108: svaprasthāno 'ntaḥprajñaḥ saptāṅga ekonaviṃśatimukhaḥ praviviktabhuktaijaso dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ MandUpC_4
GV05agsas_1u:110: jāgratprajñānekasādhanā bahir viṣaya evāvabhāsamānā manaḥspandanamātrā satī tathābhūtaṃ saṃskāraṃ manasyādhatte /
GV05agsas_1u:111: tan manas tathā saṃskṛtaṃ citrita iva paṭo bāhyasādhanān anapekṣam avidyākāmakarmabhiḥ preryamāṇaṃ jāgradvadavabhāsate /
GV05agsas_1u:112: tathā coktam”asya lokasya sarvāvato mātrām apādāya”(bṛ.u.4 / iti /
GV05agsas_1u:118: indriyāpekṣayāntaḥsthatvān manasas tad vāsanārūpā ca svapne prajñā yasyātyantaḥprajñaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:119: viṣayaśūnyānāṃ prajñāyāṃ kevalaprakāśasvarūpāyāṃ viṣayitvena bhavatīti taijasaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:121: iha punaḥ kevalā vāsanāmātrā prajñā bhojyeti pravivikto bhoga iti /
GV05agsas_1u:125: darśanādarśanavṛttyas tatvāprabodhalakṣaṇasya svāpasya tulyatvāt suṣuptigrahaṇārthaṃ yatra supta ityādi viśeṣaṇam /
GV05agsas_1u:126: atha vā triṣv api sthāneṣu tattvāpratibodhalakṣaṇaḥ svāpo 'viśiṣṭa
GV05agsas_1u:127: iti pūrvābhyāṃ suṣuptaṃ vibhajate yatra supto na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati tat suṣuptam |
GV05agsas_1u:128: suṣuptasthāna ekībhūtaḥ prajñānaghana evāndamayo hy ānandabhukcetomukhaḥ prājñaḥ tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ MandUpC_5
GV05agsas_1u:129: yatra yasmin sthāne kāle vā supto na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate /
GV05agsas_1u:130: na hi suṣupte pūrvayor ivānyathāgrahaṇalakṣaṇaṃ svapnadarśanaṃ kāmo vā kaścana vidyane /
GV05agsas_1u:132: sthānadvayapravibhaktaṃ manaḥ spanditaṃ dvaitajātaṃ tathā rūpāparityāgenāvivekāpannaṃ naiśatamograstamivāhaḥ saprapañcamekībhūtam ity ucyate /
GV05agsas_1u:133: ata eva svapnajāgran manaḥspandanāni prajñānāni ghanībhūtānīva seyamavasthāvivekarūpatvāt prajñānaghanocyate /
GV05agsas_1u:134: yathā rātrau naiśena tamasā vibhajyamānaṃ sarvaṃ ghanam iva tadvat prajñānaghana eva /
GV05agsas_1u:138: hīyaṃ sthitiranenānubhūyata ity ānandabhuk”eṣo 'sya parama ānandaḥ”(bṛ.u.4
GV05agsas_1u:141: bodhalakṣaṇaṃ vā ceto dvāraṃ mukham asya svapnādy āgamanaṃ pratīti cetomukhaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:144: athavā prajñaptimātram asyaivāsādhāraṇaṃ rūpam iti prājña itarayor viśiṣṭam api vijñānam asti
GV05agsas_1u:147: eṣaḥ sarveśvara eṣa sarvajña eṣo 'ntaryāmy eṣa yoniḥ sarvasya
GV05agsas_1u:150: eṣa hi svarūpāvasthaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sādhidaivikasya bhedajātasya sarvasyeśitā naitasmāj jātyantarabhūto 'nyeṣām iva /
GV05agsas_1u:153: ayam eva hi sarvasya sarvabhedāvastho jñātetyeṣa sarvajñaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:154: eṣo 'ntaryāmy antaranupraviśya sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ niyantāpy eṣa eva /
GV05agsas_1u:155: ata eva yathoktaṃ sabhedaṃ jagatprasūyata ity eṣa yoniḥ sarvasya /
GV05agsas_1u:156: yata evaṃ prabhavaś cāpi yaś ca prabhavāpyayau hi bhūtānām eṣa eva //6//
GV05agsas_1u:160: bahiḥprajño vibhuḥ viśvo hy antaḥprajñas tu taijasaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:161: ghanaprajñaḥ tathā prājña eka eva tridhā smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_1.1 //
GV05agsas_1u:163: paryāyeṇa tristhānatvāt sa aham iti smṛtyā pratisandhānāc ca sthānatrayavyatiriktamekatvaṃ śuddhatvam asaṅgatvaṃ ca siddham ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:167: ślokaḥ dakṣiṇākṣimukhe viśvo manasy antas tu taijasaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:168: ākāśe ca hṛdi prājñas tridhā dehe vyavasthitaḥ // MandUpK_1.2 //
GV05agsas_1u:169: dakṣiṇam akṣyeva mukhaṃ tasminprādhānyena draṣṭā sthūlānāṃ viśvo
GV05agsas_1u:170: 'nubhūyate”indho ha vai nāmaiṣa yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣaḥ” /
GV05agsas_1u:173: ādityāntargato vairāja ātmā cakṣuṣi ca draṣṭaikaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:174: nanv ayo hiraṇyagarbhaḥ kṣetrajño dakṣiṇo 'kṣi(kṣa)ṇyakṣṇorniyantā draṣṭā cānyo dehasvāmī
GV05agsas_1u:185: dakṣiṇākṣigato rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā nimīlitākṣas tadeva smaran manasyantaḥ svapna iva tadeva vāsanārūpābhivyaktaṃ paśyati /
GV05agsas_1u:187: ato manasyantas tu taijaso 'pi viśva eva /
GV05agsas_1u:188: ākāśe ca hṛdi smaraṇākhyavyāpāroparame prājña ekībhūto ghanaprajña eva bhavati manovyāpārābhāvāt
GV05agsas_1u:189: darśanasmaraṇa eva hi manaḥspandite tadabhāve hṛdyevāviśeṣeṇa prāṇātmanāvasthānam /
GV05agsas_1u:200: yadyapi prāṇābhimāne sati vyākṛtataiva prāṇasya tathāpi piṇḍaparicchinnaviśeṣābhimānanirodhaḥ prāṇobhavatītyavyākṛta eva prāṇaḥ suṣupte paricchinnābhimānavatām /
GV05agsas_1u:201: yathā prāṇalaye paricchinnābhimānināṃ prāṇo 'vyākṛtas tathā prāṇābhimānino 'py aviśeṣāpattāvavyākṛtatā samānā prasavabījātmakatvaṃ ca tadadhyakṣaś caiko 'vyākṛtāvasthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:202: paricchinnābhimāninām adhyakṣāṇāṃ ca tena ekatvam iti pūrvoktaṃ viśeṣaṇamekībhūta prajñānaghana ityādyupapantam /
GV05agsas_1u:211: yady api tadbrahma prāṇaśabdavācyaṃ tatra tathāpi jīvaprasavabījātmakatvam apiratyajya eva prāṇaśabdatvaṃ sataḥ sacchabdavācyatā ca /
GV05agsas_1u:216: nirbījatayaiva cet sati līnānāṃ suṣuptapralayayoḥ punarutthānānupapattiḥ syāt /
GV05agsas_1u:219: tasmāt sa bījatvābhyupagamena eva sataḥ prāṇatvavyapadeśaḥ sarvaśrutiṣu ca kāraṇatvavyapadeśaḥ
GV05agsas_1u:224: tāṃ bījāvasthāṃ tasyaiva prājñaśabdavācyasya turīyatvena dehādisaṃbandhajāgradādirahitāṃ pāramārthikīṃ pṛthagvakṣyati /
GV05agsas_1u:228: viśvaḥ hi sthūlabhuṅ nityaṃ taijasaḥ praviviktabhuk /
GV05agsas_1u:229: ānandabhuk tathā prājñastridhā bhogaṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_1.3 //
GV05agsas_1u:230: sthūlaṃ tarpayate viśvaṃ praviviktaṃ tu taijasam /
GV05agsas_1u:231: ānandaś ca tathā prājñaṃ tridhā tṛptiṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_1.4 //
GV05agsas_1u:234: triṣu dhāmasu yadbhojyaṃ bhoktā yaś ca prakīrtitaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:235: vadaitadubhayaṃ yas tu sa bhuñjāno na lipyate // MandUpK_1.5 //
GV05agsas_1u:236: triṣu dhāmasu jāgradādiṣu sthūlapraviviktānandākhyaṃ bhojyam ekaṃ tridhābhūtam /
GV05agsas_1u:237: yaś ca viśvataijasaprājñākhyo bhoktaikaḥ sa aham ityekatvenapratisaṃdhānāddraṣṭutvāviśeṣāc ca prakīrtitaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:238: yo vedaitadubhayaṃ bhojyabhoktṛtayānekadhā bhinnaṃ sa bhuñjāno na lipyate /
GV05agsas_1u:240: na hi yasya yo viṣayaḥ sa tena hīyate vardhate vā na hy agniḥ svaviṣayaṃ dagdhvā kāṣṭhādi tadvat //5//
GV05agsas_1u:243: sarvaṃ janayati prāṇaś ceto 'ṃśūn puruṣaḥ pṛthak // MandUpK_1.6 //
GV05agsas_1u:244: satāṃ vidyamānānāṃ svenāvidyākṛtanāmarūpamāyāsvarūpeṇa sarvabhāvānāṃ viśvataijasaprājñabhedānāṃ prabhavotpattiḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:245: vakṣyati ca”vandhyāputro na tattvena māyayā vāpi jāyate”iti /
GV05agsas_1u:246: yadi hy asatām eva janma syād brahmaṇo 'vyavahāryasya
GV05agsas_1u:248: dṛṣṭaṃ ca rajjusarpādīnām avidyākṛtamāyābījotpannānāṃ rajjvādy ātmanā satvam /
GV05agsas_1u:249: na hi nirāspadā rajjusarpamṛgatṛṣṇikādayaḥ kvacid upalabhyante kenacit /
GV05agsas_1u:250: yathā rajjvāṃ prāksarpotpatte rajjvātmanāṃ sarpaḥ sanneva āsīd evaṃ sarvabhāvānām utpatteḥ prākprāṇabījātmanaiva satvam /
GV05agsas_1u:253_0: sarvaṃ janayati prāṇaścetoṃ'śūnaṃśava iva raveś cidātmakasya puruṣasya cetorūpā jalārkasamāḥ prājñataijasaviśvabhedena devatiryagādidehabhedeṣu
GV05agsas_1u:253_1: vibhāvyamānāś cetoṃśavoyetān puruṣaḥ pṛthag viṣayabhāvavilakṣaṇān agniviṣphuliṅgavat salakṣaṇāñjalārkavac ca jīvalakṣaṇāṃstvitarān
GV05agsas_1u:256: vibhūtiṃ prasavaṃ tv anye manyante sṛṣṭicintakāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:258: vibhūtir vistāreśvarasya sṛṣṭir iti sṛṣṭicintakā manyante na tu paramārthacintakānāṃ sṛṣṭav ādara ity arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:260_0: na hi māyāvinaṃ sūtram ākāśe nikṣipya tena sāyudham āruhya cakṣurgocaratām atītya yuddhena khaṇḍaśaśchinnaṃ patitaṃ punarutthitaṃ
GV05agsas_1u:260_1: ca paśyatāṃ tat kṛtaṃ māyādisatatvacintāyām ādaro bhavati tathaivāyaṃ māyāvinaḥ sūtraprasāraṇasamaḥ suṣuptasvapnādivikāsastadārūḍhamayāvisamaś
GV05agsas_1u:261: sūtratadārūḍhābhyāmanyaḥ paramārthamāyāvī sa eva bhūmiṣṭho māyāchanno
GV05agsas_1u:262: 'dṛśyamāna eva sthito yathā tathā turīyākhyaṃ paramārthatattvam /
GV05agsas_1u:263: atas tac cintāyām evādaro mumukṣūṇāmāryāṇāṃ na niṣprayojanāyāṃ sṛṣṭav ādara ityataḥ sṛṣṭicintakānām evaite vikalpety āha svapnamāyāsarūpeti /
GV05agsas_1u:266: icchāmātraṃ prabhoḥ sṛṣṭir iti sṛṣṭau viniścitāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:267: kālāt prasūtiṃ bhūtānāṃ manyante kālacintakāḥ // MandUpK_1.8 //
GV05agsas_1u:268: icchāmātraṃ prabhoḥ satyasaṃkalpatvāt sṛṣṭir ghaṭādiḥ saṃkalpanāmātraṃ na saṃkalpanātiriktam
GV05agsas_1u:271: bhogārthaṃ sṛṣṭir iti anye krīḍārtham iti cāpare /
GV05agsas_1u:272: devasyaiṣa svabhāvo 'yam āptakāmasya kā spṛhā // MandUpK_1.9 //
GV05agsas_1u:273: bhogārthaṃ krīḍārtham iti cānye sṛṣṭiṃ manyante /
GV05agsas_1u:274: anayoḥ pakṣayor dūṣaṇaṃ devasyaiṣa svabhāvo 'yam iti devasya svabhāvapakṣam āśritya sarveṣāṃ vā pakṣāṇām āptakāmasya kā spṛheti /
GV05agsas_1u:275: na hi rajjvādīnām avidyāsvabhāvavyatirekeṇa sarpādyābhāsatve kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum //9//
GV05agsas_1u:277: caturthaḥ pādaḥ kramaprāpto vaktavya ity āhanāntaḥprajñam ityādinā /
GV05agsas_1u:278: sarvaśabdapravṛttinimittaśūnyatvāt tasya śabdānabhidheyatvam iti viśeṣapratiṣedhena eva ca turīyaṃ nirdidikṣati /
GV05agsas_1u:280: na mithyāvikalpasya nirnimittatvānupapatter na hi rajatasarpapuruṣamṛgatṛṣṇikādivikalpāḥ śuktikārajjusthāṇur ūṣarādi vyatirekeṇāvastvāspadāḥ śakyāḥ kalpayitum /
GV05agsas_1u:281: evaṃ tarhi prāṇādisarvavikalpāspadatvāt turīyasya śabdavācyatvam iti na pratiṣedhaiḥ pratyāyyatvam
GV05agsas_1u:285: nāpi pramāṇāntaraviṣayatvaṃ svarūpeṇa gavādivad ātmano nirupādhikatvād /
GV05agsas_1u:293: na ca turīyasyā'tmatvānavagame kāraṇamasti sarvopaniṣadāṃ tādarthyenopakṣayāt /
GV05agsas_1u:296: so 'yam ātmā paramārthāparamārtharūpaś catuṣpāda ity uktas tasyāparamārtharūpam avidyākṛtaṃ rajjusarpādisamam uktaṃ pādatrayalakṣaṇaṃ bījāṅkurasthānīyam /
GV05agsas_1u:297: athedānīṃ bījātmakaṃ paramārthasvarūpaṃ rajjusthānīyaṃ sarpādisthānīyoktasthānatrayānirākaraṇenāha nāntaḥ prajñamityādi /
GV05agsas_1u:298: nāntaḥprajñaṃ na bahiḥprajñaṃ nobhayataḥprajñaṃ na prajñānaghanaṃ na prajñaṃ nāprajñam |
GV05agsas_1u:299: adṛṣṭam avyavahāryam agrāhyam alakṣaṇam acintyam avyapadeśyam ekātmapratyayasāraṃ prapañcopaśamaṃ śāntaṃ śivam advaitaṃ caturthaṃ manyante |
GV05agsas_1u:302: nanv ātmanaś catuṣpātvaṃ pratijñāya prādatrayakathanena eva caturthasyāntaḥ prajñādibhyo anyatve siddhe nāntaḥ prajña ityādi pratiṣedho 'narthakaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:303: na sarpādivikalpapratiṣedhena eva rajjusvarūpapratipattivattryavasthasya evātmanas turīyatvena pratipipādayiṣitatvāt /
GV05agsas_1u:305: yadi hi tryavasthātmavilakṣaṇaṃ turīyam anyat tatpratipattidvārābhāvācchāstropadeśānarthakyaṃ śūnyatāpattir vā /
GV05agsas_1u:306_0: rajjur iva sarpādibhirvikalpyamānā sthānatraye 'py ātmaika evāntaḥ prajñāditvena vikalpyate yadā tadāntaḥ prajñatvādipratiṣedhavijñānapramāṇasamakālamevātmany
GV05agsas_1u:306_1: anarthaprapañcanivṛttilakṣaṇaphalaṃ parisamāptam iti turīyādhigame pramāṇāntaraṃ sādhanāntaraṃ vā ma mṛgyam /
GV05agsas_1u:307: rajjusarpavivekasamakāla iva rajjvāṃ sarpanivṛttiphale sati rajjvadhigayasya /
GV05agsas_1u:308: yeṣāṃ punas tamo 'panayavyatirekeṇa ghaṭādhigame pramāṇaṃ vyāpriyate
GV05agsas_1u:311_1: pravṛttā tadavayavadvaidhībhāvaphalāvasānā tathā nāntarīyakaṃ ghaṭavijñānaṃ na tat
GV05agsas_1u:313: na ca tadvad apy ātmany adhyāropitāntaḥ prajñatvādivivekakaraṇe pravṛttasya pratiṣedhavijñānapramāṇasyānupāditsitāntaḥ prajñatvadinivṛttivyatirekeṇa turīye vyāpāra upapattiḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:315: tathā ca vakṣyati”jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate”(māṇḍū.kā.1.18) iti /
GV05agsas_1u:318: tasmāt pratiṣedhavijñānapramāṇavyāpārasamakālair vātmany adhyāropitāntaḥ prajñatvādyanarthānivṛttir iti siddham /
GV05agsas_1u:319: nāntaḥ prajñam iti taijasapratiṣedho na bahiṣprajñam iti viśvapratiṣedhaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:324: kathaṃ punarantaḥ prajñatvādīnām ātmani gamyamānānāṃ rajjvādau sarpādivat pratiṣedhādasatvaṃ gamyata ity ucyate /
GV05agsas_1u:325: jñasvarūpāviśeṣe 'pītaretaravyabhicārādrajjvādāv iva sarpadhārādivikalpita bhedavat sarvatrāvyabhicārājjñasvarūpasya satyatvam /
GV05agsas_1u:332: alakṣaṇamaliṅgam ity etad ananumey ity arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:335: ekātmapratyayasāraṃ jāgradādisthāneṣv eko 'yam ātmetyavyabhicārī yaḥ pratyayastenānusaraṇīyam
GV05agsas_1u:336: athavaika ātmapratyayaḥ sāraṃ pramāṇaṃ yasya turīyasyādhigame tat turīyamekātmapratyayasāram
GV05agsas_1u:340: ata eva śāntamavikriyaṃ śivaṃ yato 'dvaitaṃ bhedavikalparahitam /
GV05agsas_1u:342: sa ātmā sa vijñeya iti pratīyamānasarpabhūchidradaṇḍādivyatiriktā yathā rajjus tathā tattvamasītyādivākyārtha
GV05agsas_1u:345: sa vijñeya iti bhūtapūrvagatyā jñāte dvaitābhāvaḥ //7//
GV05agsas_1u:347: atraite ślokā bhavanti nivṛtteḥ sarvaduḥkhānām īśānaḥ prabhur avyayaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:348: advaitaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ devās turyo vibhuḥ smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_1.10 //
GV05agsas_1u:349: prājñataijasaviśvalakṣaṇānāṃ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ nivṛtte īśānas turīya ātmā /
GV05agsas_1u:350: īśāna ity asya vyākhyānaṃ prabhur iti /
GV05agsas_1u:353: avyayo na vyeti svarūpān na vyabhicaratīti yāvat /
GV05agsas_1u:355: yasmād advaitaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ rajjusarpavanmṛṣātvāt sa eṣa devo dyotanāt turīyaś caturtho vibhuvyāpī smṛtaḥ //10//
GV05agsas_1u:357: viśvādīnāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvo nirūpyate turyayāthātmyāvadhāraṇārtham kāryakāraṇabaddhau tāv iṣyete viśvataijasau /
GV05agsas_1u:358: prājñaḥ kāraṇabaddhas tu dvau tau turye na sidhyataḥ // MandUpK_1.11 //
GV05agsas_1u:361: tattvāgrahaṇān yathāgrahaṇābhyāṃ bījaphalabhāvābhyāṃ tau yathoktau viśvataijasau baddhau saṃgṛhītāviṣyete
GV05agsas_1u:363: tattvāpratibodhamātram eva hi bījaṃ prājñatve nimittam /
GV05agsas_1u:364: tato dvau tau bījaphalabhāvau tatvāgrahaṇān yathā grahaṇe turye na sidhyato na vidyete na sambhavata ity arthaḥ //11//
GV05agsas_1u:366: kathaṃ punaḥ kāraṇabaddhatvaṃ prājñasya turīye vā tattvāgrahaṇān yathāgrahaṇalakṣaṇau bandhau na sidhyata iti /
GV05agsas_1u:367: yasmāt nātmānaṃ na parāś caiva na satyaṃ na api cānṛtam /
GV05agsas_1u:368: prājñaḥ kiñcana saṃvetti turyaṃ tat sarvadṛk sadā // MandUpK_1.12 //
GV05agsas_1u:369: ātmavilakṣaṇam avidyābījaprasūtaṃ bāhyaṃ dvaitaṃ prājño na kiñcana saṃvetti tathā viśvataijasau
GV05agsas_1u:370: tataś cāsau tattvāgrahaṇena tamasānyathā grahaṇabījabhūtena baddho bhavati
GV05agsas_1u:371: yasmāt turīyaṃ tatsarvadṛksadā turīyādanyasyābhāvāt sarvadā sadaivaiti sarvaṃ ca tadddṛkceti sarvadṛk tasmān na tattvāgrahaṇalakṣaṇaṃ bījaṃ tatra
GV05agsas_1u:372: tat prasūtasyānyathāgrahaṇasyāpyataivābhāvo na hi savitari sadā prākāśātmake tad viruddham aprakāśanam anyathā prakāśanaṃ vā sambhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:376: atha vā jāgratsvapnayoḥ sarvabhūtāvasthaḥ sarvavastudṛgābhāsas turīyaiveti
GV05agsas_1u:380: bījanidrāyutaḥ prājñaḥ sā ca turye na vidyate // MandUpK_1.13 //
GV05agsas_1u:382: kathaṃ dvaitāgrahaṇasya tulyatvāt kāraṇabaddhatvaṃ prājñasya eva na turīyasyeti prāptāśaṅkā nivartyate /
GV05agsas_1u:384: sa eva ca viśeṣapratibodhaprasavasya bījaṃ sā bījanidrā tayā yutaḥ prājñaḥ
GV05agsas_1u:385: sadā dṛksvabhāvatvāt tattvāpratibodhalakṣaṇā nidrā turīye na vidyate 'to
GV05agsas_1u:389: na nidrāṃ naiva ca svapnaṃ turye paśyanti niścitaḥ // MandUpK_1.14 //
GV05agsas_1u:394: prājñas tu svapnavarjitakevalaiva nidrayā yuta iti kāraṇabaddha ity uktam
GV05agsas_1u:395: nobhayaṃ paśyanti turīye niścitā brahmavido viruddhatvāt savitarīva tamaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:396: ato na kāryakāraṇabaddha ity uktas turīyaḥ //14//
GV05agsas_1u:398: kadā turīye niścito bhavatītyucyate anyathā gṛhṇataḥ svapno nidrā tattvam ajānataḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:399: viparyāse tayoḥ kṣīṇe turīyaṃ padam aśnute // MandUpK_1.15 //
GV05agsas_1u:400: svapnajāgaritayoranyathā rajvāṃ sarpa iva gṛhṇatastattvaṃ svapno bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:403: anyathāgrahaṇaprādhānyāc ca guṇabhūtā nidreti tasmin viparyāsaḥ svapnaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:404: tṛtīye tu sthānetattvājñānalakṣaṇā nidraiva kevalā viparyāsaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:405: atas tayoḥ kāryakāraṇasthānayor anyathāgrahaṇāgrahaṇalakṣaṇaviparyāse kāryakāraṇabandharūpe paramārthatatvapritabodhataḥ kṣīṇe turīyaṃ padam aśnute /
GV05agsas_1u:406: tadobhayalakṣaṇaṃ bandharūpaṃ tatrāpaśyaṃs turīye niścito bhavatīty arthaḥ
GV05agsas_1u:409: ajam anidram asvapnam advaitaṃ budhyate tadā // MandUpK_1.16 //
GV05agsas_1u:410_0: yo 'yaṃ saṃsārī jīvaḥ sobhayalakṣaṇena tattvāpratibodharūpeṇa bījātmanānyathāgrahaṇalakṣaṇena cānādikālapravṛttena māyālakṣaṇena
GV05agsas_1u:410_1: svapnena mamāyaṃ pitā putro 'yaṃ naptā kṣetraṃ paśavo 'ham eṣāṃ svāmī sukhī duḥkhī kṣayito 'ham anena vardhitaś cānena ity
GV05agsas_1u:412_0: yadā vedāntārthatattvābhijñena paramakāruṇikena guruṇā nāsyaivaṃ tvaṃ hetuphalātmakaḥ kiṃ tu tattvam asīti pratibodhyamānas
GV05agsas_1u:412_1: tadaivaṃ pratibudhyate katham? nāsmin bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ vā janmādibhāvavikāro 'sty ato 'jaṃ
GV05agsas_1u:414: yasmāj janmādikāraṇabhūtaṃ nāsminn avidyātamobījaṃ nidrā vidyata ity anidram /
GV05agsas_1u:415: anidraṃ hi tat turīyamata evāsvapnaṃ tan nimittatvād anyathāgrahaṇasya /
GV05agsas_1u:416: yasmāc cānidram asvapnaṃ tasmād ajam advaitaṃ turīyam ātmānaṃ budhyate tadā //16//
GV05agsas_1u:418: prapañcanivṛtyā cet pratibudhyate 'nivṛtte prapañce katham advaitam ity ucyate
GV05agsas_1u:419: prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:420: māyāmātram idaṃ dvaitam advaitaṃ paramārthataḥ // MandUpK_1.17 //
GV05agsas_1u:421: satyam avaṃ syāt prapañco yadi vidyeta rajjvāṃ sarpa iva kalpitatvān na tu sa vidyate /
GV05agsas_1u:423: na hi rajjvāṃ bhrāntibuddhyā kalpitaḥ sarpo vidyamānaḥ sanvivekato nivṛttaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:424: naiva māyā māyāvinā prayuktā tad darśināṃ cakṣurbandhāpagame vidyamānā satī nivṛttā /
GV05agsas_1u:425: tathedaṃ prapañcākhyaṃ māyāmātraṃ dvaitaṃ rajjuvan māyāvivaccadvaitaṃ paramārthatas tasmān na kaścit prapañcaḥ pravṛtto nivṛtto vāstītīty abhiprāyaḥ //17//
GV05agsas_1u:427: nanu śāstā śāstraṃ śiṣya iti vikalpaḥ kathaṃ nivartata ity ucyate vikalpo vinivarteta kalpito yadi kenacit /
GV05agsas_1u:428: upadeśād ayaṃ vādo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate // MandUpK_1.18 //
GV05agsas_1u:429: vikalpo vinivarteta yadi kenacit kalpitaḥ syāt /
GV05agsas_1u:430: yathāyaṃ prapañco māyārajjusarpavat tathāyaṃ śiṣyādi bhedavikalpo 'pi prāk pratibodhādevopadeśanimitto 'topadeśādayaṃ vādaḥ śiṣyaḥ śāstā śāstram iti /
GV05agsas_1u:431: upadeśakārye tu jñāne nirvṛtte jñāte paramārthatatve dvaitaṃ na vidyate
GV05agsas_1u:433: abhidheyapradhāna oṃkāraś catuṣpādātmeti vyākhyāto yaḥ so 'yam ātmādhyakṣaram oṃkāraḥ |
GV05agsas_1u:434: adhimātraṃ pādā mātrā mātrāśca pādā akāra ukāro makāra iti ||
GV05agsas_1u:439: kiṃ punas tadakṣaram ity āha oṃkāraḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:440: so 'yam oṃkāraḥ pādaśaḥ pravibhajyamāno 'dhimātraṃ mātrām adhikṛtya vartata ity adhimātram
GV05agsas_1u:441: katham? ātmano ye pādāsta oṃkārasya mātrāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:444: tatra viśeṣaniyamaḥ kriyate jāgaritasthāno vaiśvānaraḥ akāraḥ prathamā mātrāpterādimattvād vā |
GV05agsas_1u:445: āpnoti ha vai sarvān kāmān ādiś ca bhavati ya evaṃ veda || MandUp_9
GV05agsas_1u:447: jāgaritasthāno vaiśvānaro yaḥ sa oṃkārasyākāraḥ prathamā mātrā /
GV05agsas_1u:448: kena sāmānyenety āha āpterāptirvyāptikāreṇa sarvā vāg vyāptā /
GV05agsas_1u:451: tathā vaiśvānareṇa jagat”tasya ha vaitasyātmano vaiśvānarasya
GV05agsas_1u:455: ādirasya vidyata ityādi madyathaivādimadakārākhyamakṣaraṃ tathaiva vaiśvānaras tasmād vā sāmānyād akāratvaṃ vaiśvānarasya /
GV05agsas_1u:456: tad ekatvavidaḥ phalam āha āpnoti ha vai sarvān kāmānādiḥ prathamaś ca bhavati mahatāṃ ya evaṃ veda yadoktam ekatvaṃ vedety arthaḥ //9//
GV05agsas_1u:458: svapnasthānas taijasa ukāro dvitīyā mātrotkarṣād ubhayatvād vā |
GV05agsas_1u:461: nāsyābrahmavit kule bhavati ya evaṃ veda || MandUp_10 ||
GV05agsas_1u:462: svapnasthānas taijaso yaḥ sa oṃkārasyokāro dvitīyā mātrā /
GV05agsas_1u:464: akārād utkṛṣṭa iva hy ukāras tathā taijaso viśvād ubhayatvād akāramakārayor madhyasyokāras tathā viśvaprājñayor madhye taijaso
GV05agsas_1u:468: samānas tulyaś ca mitrapakṣasyaiva śatrupakṣāṇām apy apradveṣyo bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:469: abrahmavidasya kule na bhavati ya evaṃ veda //10//
GV05agsas_1u:471: suṣuptasthānaḥ prājño makāraḥ tṛtīyā mātrā miter apīter vā |
GV05agsas_1u:472: minoti ha vā idaṃ sarvam apītiś ca bhavati ya evaṃ veda || MandUp_11
GV05agsas_1u:473: suṣuptasthānaḥ prājño yaḥ sa oṃkārasya makāras tṛtīyā mātrā /
GV05agsas_1u:474: kena sāmānyenety āha sāmānyamidam atra mito 'mitirmānaṃ mīyata iva viśvataijasau prājñena pralayotpattyoḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:475: praveśanirgamābhyāṃ prastheneta yavās tathauṃkārasamāptau punaḥ prayoge ca praviśya nirgacchata ivākāroṃkārau makāre /
GV05agsas_1u:478: oṃkāra uccāraṇe hy antyākṣara ekībhūtāvivākāra oṃkārau /
GV05agsas_1u:480: ato vā sāmānyād ekatvaṃ prājñam akārayoḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:481: vidvatphalam āha minoti ha vedaṃ sarvaṃ jagad yāthātmyaṃ jānātīty arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:482: apītiś ca jagat kāraṇātmā bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:485: atraite ślokā bhavanti viśvasyātvavivakṣāyām ādisāmānyam utkṛṣṭam /
GV05agsas_1u:486: mātrāsaṃpratipattau syād āptisāmānyam eva ca // MandUpK_1.19 //
GV05agsas_1u:487: viśvasyātvamakāramātratvaṃ yadā vivakṣyate tadāditvasāmānyamuktanyāyenotkaṭamudbhṛtaṃ dṛśyata ity arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:490: āptisāmānyam eva cotkaṭam ity anuvartate ca śabdāt //19//
GV05agsas_1u:493: mātrāsaṃpratipattau syād ubhayatvaṃ tathā vidham // MandUpK_1.20 //
GV05agsas_1u:494: taijasasyātvavijñānokāratvavivakṣāyāmutkarṣo dṛśyate sphuṭaṃ spaṣṭa ity artha ubhayatvaṃ ca sphuṭam eveti /
GV05agsas_1u:498: mātrāsaṃpratipattau tu layasāmānyam eva ca // MandUpK_1.21 //
GV05agsas_1u:499: makāratve prājñasya mitilayāvutkṛṣṭe sāmānya ity arthaḥ //21//
GV05agsas_1u:501: triṣu dhāmasu yat tulyaṃ sāmānyaṃ vetti niścitaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:502: sa pūjyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vandyaś caiva mahāmuniḥ // MandUpK_1.22 //
GV05agsas_1u:503: yathoktasthānatraye yastulyam uktaṃ sāmānyaṃ vetyavam evaitad iti niścito yaḥ sa pūjyo vandyaś ca brahmavilloke bhavati //22//
GV05agsas_1u:505: yathoktaiḥ sāmānyair ātmapādānāṃ mātrābhiḥ sahaikatvaṃ kṛtvā yathoktam oṃkāraṃ pratipadya yo dhyāyati tam akāro nayate viśvam ukāraś cāpi taijasam /
GV05agsas_1u:506: makāraś ca punaḥ prājñaṃ nāmātre vidyate gatiḥ // MandUpK_1.23 //
GV05agsas_1u:508: akārālambanam oṃkāraṃ vidvān vaiśvānaro bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:512: kṣīṇe tu makāre bījabhāvakṣayādamātra oṃkāre gatir na vidyate kvacid ity arthaḥ //23//
GV05agsas_1u:516: saṃviśaty ātmanātmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda || MandUp_12 ||
GV05agsas_1u:517: amātro mātrā yasya nāsti sa amātra oṃkāraś caturthas turīya ātmaiva kevalo 'bhidhānābhidheyarūpayor avāṅmanasayoḥ kṣīṇatvād avyavahāryaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:518: prapañca upaśamaḥ śivo 'dvaitaḥ saṃvṛtta evaṃ yathokta vijñānavatā prayukta oṃkāras trimātras tripāda ātmaiva /
GV05agsas_1u:520: svaṃ pāramārthikam ātmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda /
GV05agsas_1u:521: paramārthadarśī brahmavit tṛtīyaṃ bījabhāvaṃ dagdhvātmānaṃ praviṣṭa iti na puno jāyate turīyasyābījatvāt
GV05agsas_1u:522: na hi rajjusarpayor viveke rajjvāṃ praviṣṭaḥ sarpo buddhisaṃskārāt punaḥ pūrvavattad vivekinām utthāsyati /
GV05agsas_1u:523_0: mandamadhyamadhiyāṃ tu pratipannasādhakabhāvānāṃ sanmārgagāmināṃ saṃnyāsināṃ mātrāṇāṃ pādānāṃ ca kḷptasāmānyavidāṃ yathāvad
GV05agsas_1u:523_1: upāsyamāna oṃkāro brahmapratipattaya ālambanī bhavati tathā ca vakṣyati'āśramās
GV05agsas_1u:527: pūrvavad atraite ślokā bhavanti oṃkāraṃ pādaśo vidyāt pādā mātrā na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:528: oṃkāraṃ pādaśo jñātvā na kiñcid api cintayet // MandUpK_1.24 //
GV05agsas_1u:529: yathoktaiḥ sāmānyaiḥ pādaiva mātrā mātrāś ca pādās tasmād oṃṅkāraṃ pādaśo vidyād ityarthaḥ
GV05agsas_1u:530: evam oṃkāre jñāte dṛṣṭārtham adṛṣṭārthaṃ vā na kiñcit prayojanaṃ cintayet kṛtārthatvād ityarthaḥ
GV05agsas_1u:532: yuñjīta praṇave cetaḥ praṇavo brahma nirbhayam /
GV05agsas_1u:533: praṇave nityayuktasya na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // MandUpK_1.25 //
GV05agsas_1u:534: yuñjīta samādadhyādyathāvyākhyāte paramārtharūpe praṇave ceto manaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:536: na hi tatra sadā yuktasya bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit 'vidvān na bibheti kutaścana'(tai.u.2.9) iti śruteḥ //25//
GV05agsas_1u:538: praṇavo hy aparaṃ brahma praṇavaś ca paraḥ smṛtaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:541: paramārthatā kṣīṇeṣu mātrāpādeṣu para evātmā brahmeti na pūrvaṃ kāraṇam asya vidyata ity apūrvaḥ
GV05agsas_1u:542: nāsyāntaraṃ bhinnajātīyaṃ kiñcid vidyata ity anantaraḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:543: tathā bāhyam anyan na vidyata ity abāhyaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:544: aparaṃ kāryam asya na vidyata ity anaparaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:545: sabāhyābhyāntaro hy ajaḥ saindhavaghanavat prajñānaghana ityarthaḥ //26//
GV05agsas_1u:547: sarvasya praṇavo hy ādir madhyam antas tathaiva ca /
GV05agsas_1u:548: evaṃ hi praṇavaṃ jñātvā vyaśnute tad anantaram // MandUpK_1.27 //
GV05agsas_1u:551: evaṃ hi praṇavamātmānaṃ māyāvyādisthānīyaṃ jñātvā tatkṣaṇādeva tad ātmabhāvaṃ vyaśnuta ity arthaḥ //27//
GV05agsas_1u:553: praṇavaṃ hīśvaraṃ vidyāt sarvasya hṛdi saṃsthitam /
GV05agsas_1u:554: sarvavyāpinam oṃkāraṃ matvā dhīro na śocati // MandUpK_1.28 //
GV05agsas_1u:555: sarvaprāṇijātasya smṛtipratyayāspade hṛdaye sthitam īśvaraṃ praṇavaṃ vidyāt sarvavyāpinaṃ vyomavad oṃkāram ātmānam asaṃsāriṇaṃ dhīro buddhimān matvā na śocati /
GV05agsas_1u:561: oṃkāro vidito yena sa munir netāro janaḥ // MandUpK_1.29 //
GV05agsas_1u:563: mīyate 'nayeti mātrā paricchittiḥ sānantā yasya sa anantamātraḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:566: oṃkaro yathā vyākhyāto vidito yena sa paramārthatatvasya mananān muniḥ /
